trial.title: Phase II Randomized Study of ABC-123 in Adults With Type-2 Diabetes
trial.description: Investigating a novel diabetes medication for blood sugar control

overview.purpose: Test if new diabetes pill controls blood sugar in adults with type-2 diabetes

criteria.text: Age 18 – 75 years (inclusive)
criteria.question: How old are you?

criteria.text: Diagnosed with Type-2 diabetes for at least 6 months
criteria.question: How long have you been diagnosed with Type-2 diabetes?

criteria.text: HbA1c level between 7.0% and 10.5%
criteria.question: What was your most recent HbA1c level? If you don't know the exact number, when was your last blood test?
criteria.expected_response: HbA1c 7.0-10.5% or recent blood test within 3 months

criteria.text: Available for all study visits over 7 months
criteria.question: Are you able to commit to attending clinic visits regularly over the next 7 months?

criteria.text: No participation in another clinical trial within the last 30 days
criteria.question: Have you participated in any other clinical trials or research studies in the past month?

trial.title: Phase III Study of HeartPlus for Cardiovascular Disease Prevention
trial.description: Evaluating a new medication for preventing heart disease in at-risk patients

overview.purpose: Evaluate if HeartPlus medication reduces the risk of heart attacks and strokes in patients with cardiovascular risk factors

criteria.text: Age 45 – 80 years (inclusive)
criteria.question: How old are you?

criteria.text: History of high blood pressure or high cholesterol
criteria.question: Do you have a history of high blood pressure or high cholesterol?
criteria.expected_response: Yes, diagnosed with hypertension or hyperlipidemia

criteria.text: No history of heart attack or stroke
criteria.question: Have you ever had a heart attack or stroke?
criteria.expected_response: No previous heart attack or stroke

criteria.text: BMI between 25 and 40
criteria.question: What is your current height and weight? (We'll calculate your BMI)

criteria.text: Available for all study visits over 12 months
criteria.question: Are you able to commit to attending clinic visits regularly over the next year?

criteria.text: Not currently taking experimental medications
criteria.question: Are you currently taking any experimental or investigational medications?

trial.title: Phase II Trial of JointCare for Rheumatoid Arthritis Management
trial.description: Testing a novel treatment approach for reducing joint inflammation and pain in rheumatoid arthritis

overview.purpose: Test if JointCare treatment reduces joint pain and inflammation in patients with rheumatoid arthritis

criteria.text: Age 18 – 70 years (inclusive)
criteria.question: How old are you?

criteria.text: Diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis for at least 1 year
criteria.question: How long have you been diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis?

criteria.text: Currently experiencing moderate to severe joint pain
criteria.question: On a scale of 1-10, how would you rate your current joint pain on average?

criteria.text: No use of biological medications in the past 6 months
criteria.question: Have you used any biological medications (like Humira, Enbrel, or Remicade) in the past 6 months?
criteria.expected_response: No biological medications in past 6 months

criteria.text: Available for weekly clinic visits
criteria.question: Are you able to visit the clinic weekly for treatments and assessments?

criteria.text: No planned surgeries in the next 8 months
criteria.question: Do you have any surgeries planned in the next 8 months?

trial.title: Phase I/II Study of ImmunoCare for Advanced Solid Tumors
trial.description: Investigating an innovative immunotherapy approach for patients with advanced solid tumors

overview.purpose: Evaluate the safety and effectiveness of ImmunoCare immunotherapy in patients with advanced solid tumors that have not responded to standard treatments

criteria.text: Age 18 – 75 years (inclusive)
criteria.question: How old are you?

trial.title: Phase III Trial of MindSharp for Mild Cognitive Impairment
trial.description: Testing a novel cognitive enhancement therapy for individuals with mild cognitive impairment

overview.purpose: Determine if MindSharp therapy can slow cognitive decline and improve memory function in patients with mild cognitive impairment

criteria.text: Age 55 – 85 years (inclusive)
criteria.question: How old are you?

criteria.text: Diagnosis of mild cognitive impairment (MCI)
criteria.question: Have you been diagnosed with mild cognitive impairment or mild memory problems by a doctor?
criteria.expected_response: Yes, diagnosed with mild cognitive impairment

criteria.text: Adequate hearing and vision for cognitive testing
criteria.question: Do you have adequate hearing and vision to participate in computer-based cognitive tests?
criteria.expected_response: Yes, adequate hearing and vision for testing

criteria.text: Stable on current medications for at least 3 months
criteria.question: Have your current medications remained stable without major changes for at least 3 months?

criteria.text: Available study partner or caregiver
criteria.question: Do you have a family member or caregiver who can attend some study visits with you?
criteria.expected_response: Yes, available study partner or caregiver
